name: ATT YouTube Widget
author: ATinyTeam

sections.description:
This plugin let you place a YouTube video in your sidebar. Easy to config and there are some options for you.

Please visit http://www.atinyteam.com.

Arbitrary section

A brief ATT YouTube

Ordered list:

  1. Display a YouTube video
  2. Options
  3. Description about the video
  4. ATinyTeam
  5. http://atinyteam.com, http://www.atinyteam.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload att-youtube plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Select options you want.
sections.faq:
How to get YouTube video link?

Please open the youtube and play a video, press Share button under the video player and copy that link.

What about option?

Please read the option and you can select options for your video.

Find Us

Go to http://www.atinyteam.com
